00068 /* ******************* node space & buttons ************** */
00069 
00070 /* poll for active nodetree */
00071 static int active_nodetree_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00072 {
00073     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00074     
00075     return (snode && snode->nodetree);
00076 }
00077 
00078 /* poll callback for active node */
00079 static int active_node_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00080 {
00081     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00082     
00083     return (snode && snode->edittree && nodeGetActive(snode->edittree));
00084 }
00085 
00086 /* active node */
00087 static void active_node_panel(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00088 {
00089     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00090     bNodeTree *ntree= (snode) ? snode->edittree : NULL;
00091     bNode *node = (ntree) ? nodeGetActive(ntree) : NULL; // xxx... for editing group nodes
00092     uiLayout *layout= pa->layout;
00093     PointerRNA ptr;
00094     
00095     /* verify pointers, and create RNA pointer for the node */
00096     if (ELEM(NULL, ntree, node))
00097         return;
00098     //if (node->id) /* for group nodes */
00099     //  RNA_pointer_create(node->id, &RNA_Node, node, &ptr);
00100     //else
00101         RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_Node, node, &ptr); 
00102     
00103     /* draw this node's name, etc. */
00104     uiItemR(layout, &ptr, "label", 0, NULL, ICON_NODE);
00105     uiItemS(layout);
00106     uiItemR(layout, &ptr, "name", 0, NULL, ICON_NODE);
00107     uiItemS(layout);
00108     
00109     uiItemO(layout, NULL, 0, "NODE_OT_hide_socket_toggle");
00110     uiItemS(layout);
00111 
00112     /* draw this node's settings */
00113     if (node->typeinfo && node->typeinfo->uifuncbut)
00114         node->typeinfo->uifuncbut(layout, (bContext *)C, &ptr);
00115     else if (node->typeinfo && node->typeinfo->uifunc)
00116         node->typeinfo->uifunc(layout, (bContext *)C, &ptr);
00117 }
00118 
00119 static int node_sockets_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00120 {
00121     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00122     
00123     return (snode && snode->nodetree && G.rt == 777);
00124 }
00125 
00126 static void node_sockets_panel(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00127 {
00128     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00129     bNodeTree *ntree= (snode) ? snode->edittree : NULL;
00130     bNode *node = (ntree) ? nodeGetActive(ntree) : NULL;
00131     bNodeSocket *sock;
00132     uiLayout *layout= pa->layout, *split;
00133     char name[UI_MAX_NAME_STR];
00134     
00135     if (ELEM(NULL, ntree, node))
00136         return;
00137     
00138     for (sock=node->inputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next) {
00139         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s:", sock->name);
00140 
00141         split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.35f, 0);
00142         uiItemL(split, name, ICON_NONE);
00143         uiTemplateNodeLink(split, ntree, node, sock);
00144     }
00145 }
00146 
00147 /* ******************* node buttons registration ************** */
00148 
00149 void node_buttons_register(ARegionType *art)
00150 {
00151     PanelType *pt;
00152     
00153     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype node panel active node");
00154     strcpy(pt->idname, "NODE_PT_item");
00155     strcpy(pt->label, IFACE_("Active Node"));
00156     pt->draw= active_node_panel;
00157     pt->poll= active_node_poll;
00158     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00159 
00160     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype node panel node sockets");
00161     strcpy(pt->idname, "NODE_PT_sockets");
00162     strcpy(pt->label, "Sockets");
00163     pt->draw= node_sockets_panel;
00164     pt->poll= node_sockets_poll;
00165     pt->flag |= PNL_DEFAULT_CLOSED;
00166     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00167     
00168     pt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype node panel gpencil");
00169     strcpy(pt->idname, "NODE_PT_gpencil");
00170     strcpy(pt->label, "Grease Pencil");
00171     pt->draw= gpencil_panel_standard;
00172     pt->poll= active_nodetree_poll;
00173     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00174 }
00175 
00176 static int node_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00177 {
00178     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00179     ARegion *ar= node_has_buttons_region(sa);
00180     
00181     if (ar)
00182         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00183 
00184     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /* non-standard poll operator which doesn't care if there are any nodes */
00188 static int node_properties_poll(bContext *C)
00189 {
00190     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00191     return (sa && (sa->spacetype == SPACE_NODE));
00192 }
00193 
00194 void NODE_OT_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
00195 {
00196     ot->name = "Properties";
00197     ot->description = "Toggles the properties panel display";
00198     ot->idname = "NODE_OT_properties";
00199     
00200     ot->exec = node_properties;
00201     ot->poll = node_properties_poll;
00202     
00203     /* flags */
00204     ot->flag = 0;
00205 }
